description: The MafiaBot made by @H1M4N5HU0P special thanks to respective HellBot owner @Kraken_The_BadASS. Join for updates related info @MafiaBot_Support

ENV.description: Set this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

ALIVE_NAME.description: Fill your Full name or Username like @H1M4N5HU0P. By default it is Mafia User

ALIVE_MSG.description: Set Custom Alive Message When entering .mafia Command.

ALIVE_PIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for alive pic in .mafia command.

BIO_MSG.description: Put Your Telegram Bio Here Required For Auto Bio.

PMPERMIT_PIC.description: put here any telegraph media link for custom pmpermit pic.

CUSTOM_PMPERMIT.description: Enter Your custom pm permit msg.
CUSTOM_PMPERMIT.value: PLEASE DO NOT SPAM MY DM, I WILL REPLY YOU AFTER COME BACK ONLINE!

PM_PERMIT_GROUP_ID.description: Put an Group Id Same As PRIVATE_GROUP_ID Required For Pmpermit plugin.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value may result In Account Ban.

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: Required for Removing image background. Get your api key from https://www.remove.bg/

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: Register an account on ocr.space to get this value(API key)....

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: Needed for Lydia AI. Follow https://telegra.ph/Lydia-09-05 to get your API.

SUDO_USERS.description: Enter your friends user id to to give him bot sudo access

SUDO_COMMAND_HAND_LER.description: Please enter sudo user command handler

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value May result In Account Ban.

PLUGIN_CHANNEL.description: Create a private group add rose  then type /id. PLUGIN_CHANNEL and PRIVATE_GROUP_ID both values should be same

PRIVATE_GROUP_BOT_API_ID.description: create a private channel and then type .get_id add that value here for save messages

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: Create a private group add rose bot then type /id. PLUGIN_CHANNEL and PRIVATE_GROUP_ID both values should be same

PM_LOGGR_BOT_API_ID.description: for login private messages create a private channel and do .get_id and add that id

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

TG_BOT_TOKEN_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the token of your bot. And Don't Forget To Turn on inline Mode on bot settings. Get it.

CHROME_BIN.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

CHROME_DRIVER.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

TG_BOT_USER_NAME_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at @BotFather and get the username of your bot

NO_OF_BUTTONS_DISPLAYED_IN_H_ME_CMD.description: Set The Amount Of Buttons Displayed In Help Command default 8

NO_OF_COLUMS_DISPLAYED_IN_H_ME_CMD.description: Set The Amount Of Rows You Want To Displayed In Help Command default 2

EMOJI_TO_DISPLAY_IN_HELP.description: Set The emojies You Want to Add In Help Command!!

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time for autopic get from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc

PM_DATA.description: Type DISABLE if you want to disable pm protection...
